about_the_game:
Sweet Slave - is a simple city defense game. Players can choose one of four bows to defend their city. Every time an enemy is defeated, they will receive monetary rewards. Players can use the money to enhance their strength or buy female slaves.

The game now has three levels, LV1, 2, and 3, which are easy, normal, and difficult. Players can choose to play any of them at any time.

Each level has 40 female slaves available for purchase. (will not be repeated)

  • Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out of images in viewing mode

  • On most pages, the "Esc" key returns to the previous page

  • During the game, press the "A" button to automatically shoot arrows and press again to stop.

detailed_description:
Sweet Slave - is a simple city defense game. Players can choose one of four bows to defend their city. Every time an enemy is defeated, they will receive monetary rewards. Players can use the money to enhance their strength or buy female slaves.

The game now has three levels, LV1, 2, and 3, which are easy, normal, and difficult. Players can choose to play any of them at any time.

Each level has 40 female slaves available for purchase. (will not be repeated)

  • Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out of images in viewing mode

  • On most pages, the "Esc" key returns to the previous page

  • During the game, press the "A" button to automatically shoot arrows and press again to stop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
